channel.title: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (15 4.0.6-202103292247) -- Point Release!
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Install
Or.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Reinstall
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
Changes:
Contains all enhancements there were recently released.
https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-for-virtualbox-15-0-1-7-2-point-release-testers-wanted/11349
----
* https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2402 * https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2403
----
Alternatively:
In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
(This forum post was previously a call for testers. No release critical bugs were found during the testing period. This forum post was therefore [transformed](https://forums.whonix.org/t/transform-whonix-testers-wanted-forum-news-post-into-whonix-release-forum-news-post-ok/11405) into a stable release announcement. See edit history.)

item.title: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (15 4.0.6-202103292247) -- Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Qubes/Install

How to Install Qubes-Whonix ™ 15

Or.

Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Qubes/Reinstall

How to Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ TemplateVMs - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Whonix – 3 Apr 21

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Changes:

Contains all enhancements there were recently released.

Whonix for VirtualBox - 15.0.1.7.2 - Point Release! News
Whonix for VirtualBox Download Whonix for VirtualBox: This is a point release. Upgrade Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository. This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix! Please Donate! Please Contribute! Major Changes OpenSSL security fix for Debian and Tor Browser (OpenSSL 1.1.1d) (CVE-2021-3449) Tor Browser 10.0.15 monero-gui v0.17.1.9 no longer install qtox by default Thanks to @madaid…
  • https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2402
  • https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2403

Alternatively:

In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

(This forum post was previously a call for testers. No release critical bugs were found during the testing period. This forum post was therefore transformed into a stable release announcement. See edit history.)

Read full topic
